gmeg.description: A Dataset of Human and LLM-Generated Explanations of Grammatical and Fluency Edits

RHAI_1.description: A dataset that includes human and AI-generated explanations for various tasks, focusing on how explanations can be reframed to improve understanding and usability.

RHAI_2.description: A dataset that includes human and AI-generated explanations for various tasks, focusing on how explanations can be reframed to improve understanding and usability.

ecqa_1.description: A dataset for commonsense explanation generation, containing questions, multiple-choice answers, and corresponding explanations to enhance understanding of everyday situations.

ecqa_2.description: A dataset for commonsense explanation generation, containing questions, multiple-choice answers, and corresponding explanations to enhance understanding of everyday situations.

hatebrxplain.description: HateBRXplain is a dataset for hate speech detection in Brazilian Portuguese, providing annotated examples of hate speech along with explanations for model predictions.

explainationhardness.description: A dataset that provides a collection of explanations for various tasks, focusing on the hardness of explanations in terms of their complexity and interpretability.
